casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Joshua SANCHEZ 410PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 5, 2017 Rudolph A. Ashton, III, Attorney at Law, New Bern, for Sanchez, Joshua. Ebony J. Pittman, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 1st of June 2017 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of June 2017."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 5th day of July 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
